title: Best of the Program | Guests: Michelle Gray & Bill O'Reilly | 11/22/19
description:
Glenn is being called anti-Semitic YET AGAIN for calling George Soros a “puppet master.” But this is not conspiracy: We have his documents laying out the whole plan! Glenn’s sister Michelle Gray joins to discuss her new book, “Healthy Meals for All,” and how Glenn needs these lean and green meals. Bill O’Reilly calls in with the latest on corruption, impeachment, and multibillion-dollar companies lining up against Trump. And let’s put it on the record one more time: We are NOT AFRAID of you, George Soros!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
